INSERT INTO leads (name, company, email, phone, status)
VALUES ({{ $json.nome_completo }}, {{ $json.empresa }}, {{ $json.email }}, {{ $json.telefone }}, 'novo')

  company = EXCLUDED.company,
  phone = EXCLUDED.phone,
  status = EXCLUDED.status;
